archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.4.1: There should be a crisis management process for dealing with major incidents in individual business environments, and serious attacks across multiple environments (supported by a business continuity plan or business continuity arrangements).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
